column4: Hi.  How do I test my webcam / get drivers for a logitech quickcam 9000 pro in ubuntu?
you can use several applications including Cheese, Ekiga
Many logitech webcams now work thanks to the linux UVC driver, so open up a program like ekiga and test it out first, if not, guarentee we can get yoru webcam working
take a look here as well: http://www.quickcamteam.net/devices
